channel.title: 317 Coder Inside
channel.description:
Q:Name? A:Spotted Muffin
Q:Age? A:16
Q:Experience? A:umm i have been coding for 5-6 months
Q:What can you do on a 317? A:All the basics and i can add skills/minigames/teleports/commands/specials(kinda)/ im willing to try and add anything. i learn from doing so ill give anything a go
Q:Are you dedicated? A:well i have a gf not braging so dont be like o hes just saying that or w/e. i have school as well i mostly work nights and on weekends from 9am to 5am depending on if i have plans but either way ill stay up till 5am
Q:What are you looking for in return? A:just an ingame rank like mod. i dont want cash or admin or owner or co owner just mod.
About me(haha heres a little more): i will not code any PI/Hyperion Sources. im a source coder not a Client coder. I do not want to code a server that is cluster with random stuff that dosent even need to be there, i also will not code a server that has random items such as dragon whips, staff armor, or barrows phat or colored santa's. if you want to interview me let me know we cant set something up.
Contact Info: i do have a mic if you want to voice chat or w/e i have skype/ventrilo/teamspeak/and teamviewer if you dont want to send me files.
MSN: Spotted_Muffin@live.com Skype: spotted_Muffin

item.title: 317 Coder Inside
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Spotted Muffin, post:3, topic:353554”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=449868.msg3300175#msg3300175 date=1281239362]
Uhhhh, wtf? Why would you post this? You answer this for a topic looking for coders…
[/quote]

umm because its a development team forums. im looking for a development team theres no difference if i post a Q/A about my self for a server on my own topic then posting a Q/A on someone else’s topic[/quote]Yes there is. This isn’t a profiling section, it’s a development section. There is not development in this thread. Before boasting about your justification on what you can and can’t post, might I suggest looking at the rules?

[quote=“Taharok, post:1, topic:297296”][ul][li]Your need to provide some sort of evidence that your development team will be successful (ie, pictures).[/li]
[li]Your work must be your own. Stealing other people’s work is unacceptable and isn’t tolerated here.[/li]
[li]Absolutely no advertising is allowed in this section. It is simply for recruiting people for your development team. You may discuss development here with your team, as well as discuss other features you plan on developing.[/li]
[li]If you are going to post a website, you must first get it approved with an Administrator or a Global Moderator. Failure to do this will result in an infraction for advertising.[/li][/ul][/quote]

Read full topic
